mdRecord.dcterms:title: Emblem of Francis I
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Front bears the image of a salimander resembling a dragon and "NVTRISCO ET EXTINGVO." Handwritten text along the side of the medallion reads "Salimander - Emblem of Francis I." On the back of the object is the text "Souvenir du Chateau de [], A.W. Just."
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medallions (Decorative arts)
